details:
noun
- a job in an organization
= synonyms: spot
- the actions and activities assigned to or required or expected of a person or group
= synonyms: function
- a religious rite or service prescribed by ecclesiastical authorities
= example: a religious rite or service prescribed by ecclesiastical authorities
- place of business where professional or clerical duties are performed
= example: place of business where professional or clerical duties are performed
= synonyms: business office
- an administrative unit of government
= synonyms: agency
- professional or clerical workers in an office
= example: professional or clerical workers in an office
= synonyms: office staff
- (of a government or government official) holding an office means being in power
= example: (of a government or government official) holding an office means being in power
= synonyms: power
